R.COVID.19 0.1.8
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Vaccinations for COVID-19 Counts for US States from Center for Disease Control (CDC)

Source: R/cdc_us_by_state.R
cdc_vac_us_by_state.Rd

This functions pulls vaccine data for US states from the CDC. No data is stored within the package, so the data should continuously update over time as long as the links do not change.

cdc_vac_us_by_state()

Value

A dataframe/tibble

Details

Website:

- CDC COVID Tracker: https://covid.cdc.gov/covid-data-tracker/#datatracker-home

- Data: https://data.cdc.gov/api/views/rh2h-3yt2/rows.csv?accessType=DOWNLOAD

Examples

vac_by_states <- R.COVID.19::cdc_vac_us_by_state()
#> Rows: 28182 Columns: 15
#> -- Column specification -------------------------------------------------------------------
#> Delimiter: ","
#> chr  (3): Date, Location, date_type
#> dbl (12): MMWR_week, Administered_Daily, Administered_Cumulative, Administer...
#> 
#> 
#> i Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
#> i Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
head(vac_by_states)
